title: Holiday Cakes and Cupcakes (Cookbook) [Epub & Mobi]
description:
Holiday Cakes and Cupcakes: 45 Fondant Designs for Year-Round Celebrations
Author: Carol Deacon
Published: 2012
Publisher: Tuttle Publishing
ISBN: 9780804842617
Format: Retail Epub and Mobi
Readers: Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre etc
Mobi- Kindle, Calibre etc
Tested on the above readers on laptop and MoonReader on Android tablet with no issues.
_____________________________________________________________________________

Note: Measurements are given in both US Imperial and Metric ...hooray!

This cookbook is a how-to guide and clearly explains the steps needed to create cakes and cupcakes for every occasion. There are information sections on utensils, cakes and decorating. Includes recipes for making your own frostings and fondant, as well as basic cake forms. After the basics are covered, the author explains how to create fondant decorations. Forty-five recipes are included and include both cake and cupcake versions.
